div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1771 Zivnik near Midyat, c. 60 km. NE of Mardin (anc. district of Gordyene, Mesopo- tamia), 1962 Burial: 175 B.C. (M) Contents: 26 AR. Pot hoard Lysimachus: 1 tetradr. ( Amphipolis) Antiochus I: 1 tetradr. ( Sardes) Seleucus III: 2 tetradr. ( Seleuceia ad Ti- grim 1, Antiocheia 1) Antiochus III: 8 tetradr. ( Ecbatana 1, Nisibis 3, Antiocheia 3, Laodiceia 1) Seleucus IV: 13 tetradr. ( Seleuceia ad Ti- grim 1, Antiocheia 10, Tarsus 2) Antiochus the Young: 1 tetradr. (An- tiocheia) Disposition: Ankara Information from S. Taller
